text: is a district located in Chiyoda, Tokyo. The Hotel New Otani Tokyo, Josai University Tokyo Kioi-cho Campus Retrieved August 26, 2016 and Shimizudani Park are located there. The name of the district is derived from the Kii clan, the Owari clan, and the Ii clan, which had residences here in the Edo era. Nagata - Kioi Hall Retrieved August 26, 2016 ==References== Category:Districts of Chiyoda, Tokyo
title: Kioichō, Chiyoda, Tokyo
